pkgmetadata.longdescription: Process and Analyze Mouse-Tracking Data // Mouse-tracking, the analysis of mouse movements in computerized experiments, is a method that is becoming increasingly popular in the cognitive sciences. The mousetrap package offers functions for importing, preprocessing, analyzing, aggregating, and visualizing mouse- tracking data. An introduction into mouse-tracking analyses using mousetrap can be found in Kieslich, Henninger, Wulff, Haslbeck, Schulte-Mecklenbeck (2019) doi:10.4324/9781315160559-9 (preprint: https://psyarxiv.com/zuvqa/).
